title: Provided further that, in case of redevelopment schemes under Regulation 33(7), 33(7)(A), 33(7)(B), 33(10) and 33(10)A, the road width of 9m for building height up to 120m and 13m for building height above 120m, shall be adequate
clause_text: Provided further that, in case of redevelopment schemes under Regulation 33(7), 33(7)(A), 33(7)(B), 33(10) and 33(10)A, the road width of 9m for building height up to 120m and 13m for building height above 120m, shall be adequate. This shall be subject to CFOâ€™s NOC.
